content.description: Start on low jugs and climb up to the row of huge pockets. Traverse right on huge holds and up at the obvious notch where the pockets end. This is an awesome warm up and a ton of fun.
content.location: This is found on the left side of Monster Roof. Look for the biggest jugs and you will find it.

content.description: Sit down start, with a long reach from opening moves.
content.location: There are a pair of V1’s on the left side of the wall.  The first problem goes straight up, and the second one traverses right on a series of pockets.

content.description: Start low on a left-facing hueco and make some long, steep moves to reach the fin-like lip of the overhang. Move past it to find buckets.
content.location: Around the middle of the Monster Roof is a small cluster of bushes. Thin Man starts just to the left of them.

content.description: Start on the lowest jugs and climb straight up, using a perfect sculpted pinch and a body twist.
content.location: Around the middle of the Monster Roof is a cluster of bushes. This problem starts just to the right of these bushes on low pockets.

content.description: Begin at good holds in the back of the roof and follow slopers and pinches straight out the belly feature, trending slightly left at the crux moves just before the lip. Just as quality as some of the more famous lines at the Draw, but it sees a fraction of the traffic.
content.protection: Pad and spotter are very highly recommended.
content.location: On the Monster Roof, a few yards to the right of the cluster of bushes, climbing out a fairly obvious belly feature.

content.description: Start low on a wierd shelf on some sharp pockets, move up and left following the chalked pockets to the big bread loaf shaped sloping pinch. Set the feet and make a big move straight up to crimps, then easier moves to the top.
content.location: At the right side of the Monster Roof

content.description: Left of Move N Groove Barbie, find the big horizontal sloper in the roof and start on jugs beneath it. Hit the sloper, match and make a big reach to a pinch/crimp. One or two more powerful moves gain the flat lip. Mantel direct or move right to make it a bit easier.
content.protection: A pad or two and a spot to keep you from rolling down the rock slab and the hill.
content.location: To the right of the bushes near the middle of the Monster Roof, just to the left of Move N Groove Barbie, look for the loaf in the roof.

content.description: A nice problem that climbs straight out the roof on mostly big holds and locker foot cams.
content.location: Between The Loaf and Move and Groove. Find a deep 2 finger pocket for the right hand.

content.description: Monster Roof is a long, low cliff band just past Anorexic Roof, undercut in the middle and near vertical at either end. Nice spread of problems from V0-V7. Beware the mountains of rodent poo in the back.
